description: Data was extracted from an older CCLE dataset from Google Genomics on February 2016. Cell line annotations was extracted using the file: CCLE_sample_info_file_2012-10-18.txt.

fields.description: Cell line primary name, appended with a short name for the location  of the cancer; e.g. TC71_BONE, HUPT4_PANCREAS, etc.
fields.name: CCLE_name

fields.description: Cell line primary name; e.g. TC-71, NIH:OVCAR-3, etc.
fields.name: Cell_line_primary_name

fields.description: The primary site on the body where the cancer was found; e.g. bone, breast, pancreas, etc.
fields.name: Site_Primary

fields.description: The histological type of cancer; e.g.  sarcoma, neuroblastoma, etc.
fields.name: Histology

fields.description: The histology subtype; eg. squamous_cell_carcinoma, undifferentiated_carcinoma, etc.
fields.name: Hist_Subtype1

fields.description: Cell line source, e.g. ATCC, DSMZ
fields.name: Source

fields.description: Name of the SNP array used e.g. LIMPS_p_NCLE_DNA2N_GenomeWideSNP_6_C09_246674
fields.name: SNP_array
